Class CinemaSystemEngine

java.lang.Object
  CinemaSystemEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CinemaSystemEngine
extends Object
implements Serializable

Provides the engine of a simple Cinema Seats Booking System.

Version:
01.11.10
Author:
Fariha Nazmul
See Also:
Serialized Form
